questions.question_text: Which of the following is the BEST way to ensure controls are maintained consistently across the environment?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Agree with B. The answer at D is somewhat tempting, but assessments guarantee you identify deviations.

Selected Answer: B
Conducting annual control assessments is the BEST way to ensure controls are maintained consistently across the environment. Annual control assessments allow for a comprehensive review of all controls, ensuring that they are being applied consistently across the environment. This helps to identify any gaps or inconsistencies in the control environment, which can then be addressed through remediation efforts. Monitoring key risk indicators (KRIs) can be a valuable tool to help identify when controls may be failing, but it is not a substitute for a comprehensive control assessment.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Agree with B.

Selected Answer: B
B. business impact analysis (BIA)

When a risk practitioner is determining a system's criticality, it is most helpful to review the associated business impact analysis (BIA). A BIA helps identify and evaluate the potential effects of an interruption or disruption to critical business operations due to an incident or event.
